segments.text: I watch the boy precariously climbing that unstable stool, reaching for the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The way he stretches his body towards the jar makes my stomach drop.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His determination is admirable, yet foolish.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I canâ€™t help but admire his boldness, but it feels so reckless.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think about how quickly fun can turn into disaster in a kitchen like this.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl beside him looks eager, almost too excited for this impending mischief.
segments.speaker: PAR
